entry.title: from the rooftops
entry.summary:
Author: sterek24 (mooncry89)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,517Chapters: 5/17Kudos: 196

Summary: Stiles Stilinski moved to Poland after the events of the Nogitsune. He's been away from Beacon Hills ever since. Now, several years later, he's back and he's bringing a few familiar faces with him. The Nemeton has been visiting Stiles's dreams, telling him he needs to come home - so that's what he's going to do. Oh, and he's going to rebuild the Hale Pack, too, no matter what True Alpha Scott McCall thinks about that.

entry.title: I knew you were trouble
entry.summary:
Author: norman123

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,716Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 114

Summary: Derek has never been particularly interested in Peter’s personal life, but when his uncle returns from Canada with a new "husband," he realizes—this is a disaster.Stiles is too loud, too bold, and far too good at getting in his way.Derek is certain that there’s something off about this "marriage," but the more he watches Stiles, the harder it becomes to ignore that anger isn’t the only thing he feels.What if he isn’t furious because Stiles became part of their family—but because he didn’t become part of his life?

entry.title: Redlight
entry.summary:
Author: mossriddened

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,139Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Stiles saw the red light, staring ahead as it passed– overhead and kept going. He didn’t even stop.He didn’t even flinch.It felt almost as if he wasn’t in the driver’s seat, not mentally at least; he was somewhere behind the wheel instead, watching through the windshield as if it were nothing more than a screen. He felt floaty; he felt detached.He barely registered the speedometer as it quietly climbed and the streetlights began to streak into lines.He barely registers when red and blue lights join in the mix behind him, blinding almost in the rearview mirrors as its colors blend together; the glow didn’t make sense; surely, he was just tired.It was just the lights.–––––––––or . .Stiles Stilinski gets put on house arrest for his own safety after breaking several traffic violations and running from the police. Although he can no longer drive away from his problems, he finds them, instead, in his reflection.

entry.title: BLOODLINE PROTOCOL
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,596Chapters: 1/12Kudos: 6

Summary: At Beacon Hills Preparatory, tradition is everything. For over a century, the elite boarding school has divided its student body into five historic houses where each one seemingly determined by a mix of academic performance, behavior, and an unspoken layer of socioeconomic legacy. Most students follow in the footsteps of their families; generation after generation they're sorted into the same houses. No one questions the system. It’s simply the way things are. Until now.Midway through his freshman year, a “routine” blood test for school health records takes an unexpected turn. One sharp-witted yet grounded Stiles, recently appointed as House Prefect of the mid-tier House Flagstaff largely due to his father’s position as the town sheriff, is abruptly reassigned to House Redwood, the school’s most elite and secretive house.He must now navigate secret traditions, political manipulation, and a slow-burning forbidden romance with someone he was never meant to meet: the enigmatic sophomore son of a ruthless defense attorney.

Author: hubrys

entry.title: The Creator's Game
entry.summary:
Author: Glitter_Lips

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 47,510Chapters: 13/38Kudos: 23

Summary: Everyone in my story is dead. Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he’s finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn’t want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn’t finished yet, and she won’t rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won’t allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.

entry.title: Sweet Tooth and Heartaches
entry.summary:
Author: sauleweeper

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,816Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 21

Summary: “You know, I don't think you ever brought anything to the fire station…” Stiles scoffs and says, “Yeah, I wonder why.” He closes his eyes as he feels the start of a migraine hitting him when his mind bursts with images of the reason why he doesn’t bring his pastries and cakes to the fire department. Why he never does. Derek Hale. His arch nemesis. His heart beats furiously just at the thought of that cursed name. or, Stiles projects on winning this year's Beacon County Fair's baking competition but Derek won't stop trying to sabotage him (Stiles has no proof, but he just knows).

entry.title: It's Just Revenge
entry.summary:
Author: Writing_Queeen

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 102,458Chapters: 24/25Kudos: 1,430

Summary: Gerard and Kate took everything from the Hales and from the sheriff when they burned down the Hale house and killed Claudia and their son. Now years later the Argents are back in town and Derek sees a way to get revenge in the form of Gerard's grandson, Stiles. Derek kidnaps Stiles but things aren't what they seem with the boy. Could taking Stiles actually have been a good thing for the boy? And if it was how far will Gerard and Kate go to get him back? Remember, Revenge Haunts All Of Us.
